<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar Conduit](/Feats.aspx?ID=1972) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 174 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=60)

**Prerequisites**
[Familiar Master Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1970); able to cast spells

**Requirements**
You have line of effect to your familiar.

</column>

---

Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, the spell uses the familiar as its origin point.
